delivery.returnsPolicy:
üõçÔ∏è Store Policy & Guidelines
Payment: Prepaid orders only. We do not offer Cash on Delivery (COD).

No Exchanges: All sales are final. Please double-check your selection before ordering.

Transit Damage: We pack all orders securely; however, we are not responsible for damage caused by the Post Office during transit.

Missing Items: Refunds are issued only for missing products caused by our error.

Unboxing Requirement: To claim a refund for missing items, you must provide a clear, unedited unboxing video.

The video must start before the package is opened.

The label must be clearly visible.

There must be no cuts, edits, or pauses in the video.

Claim Process: Send your unboxing video to our Instagram Inbox
Claims without a valid video will not be considered.

Support: For any other questions, reach us at tieandstyl@gmail.com.
